data.event: Frank Buck Zoo is inviting all of its friends, new and old, to join them in celebrating Frank “Bring ‘Em Back Alive” Buck’s birthday on March 17.

event.title: was born in Gainesville on March 17, 1884

data.event: Frank Howard Buck was born in Gainesville on March 17, 1884.
In 1911, she added, Buck began his 24 year career in the business of collecting animals for exhibit.
In 1911, she added, Buck began his 24 year career in the business of collecting animals for exhibit.

event.title: will be a buck a head ($1) during Tuesday, March 17

data.event: In honor of Buck’s birthday, zoo admission will be a buck a head ($1) during Tuesday, March 17 from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.Visitors will also be able to explore the world’s only Frank Buck Exhibit located in the zoo’s gift shop.
Frank Buck Zoo is located at 1000 W. California Street.
